Skip to contents
RRGG 0.1.0
  • Reference
    • Introduction to simulating data via regression

This to generate datasets according to linear regression model

rgsim.Rd

This is short description

Usage

rgsim(n, nv)

Source

The data comes from simulation.

Arguments

n

The sample size

nv

The number of desirable variables

Value

list of data and parameters used in simulation

Details

This is package

References

some references

Author

Author Fadhaa Ali

Examples

n<-100
var<-3
dat<-rgsim(n,var)
print(dat$data)
